21545.consumer: Lincoln Quebec Auto Show Bonus (#32220).  Standard Rules of Eligibility Apply.  Selected Canadian residents who attend one of the 2019 Canadian Auto Shows will receive a $750 Auto Show Bonus, provided they visit the Ford display and provide their contact information.  Individuals must opt-in to receive marketing communications and provide their full mailing and e-mail address to receive the offer.  Customers who do not submit their information via the on-site registration process, do not opt-in to receive marketing communications, do not provide their complete contact information, or are not randomly selected to receive a Canadian Auto Show Bonus Offer will not receive the offer and will not be eligible for the Auto Show Bonus.  Only customers that receive the Auto Show Bonus, via email, will be eligible for the offer.  Limit one per household.  Must redeem using original offer; no mechanically or otherwise reproduced certificates will be accepted.  Prior purchases not eligible.  Contact your local dealer for full program details.  Some restrictions/conditions may apply.
21545.dealer:
Lincoln Quebec Auto Show Bonus

The Lincoln Auto Show Bonus will be available to selected customers that opt-in to receive marketing communications from Ford (via Customer Service Representative Registration), receive the offer via e-mail, and who purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle during the applicable Auto Show program period.

Customer Service Representatives (CSRs) will be on-site to assist customers with questions and provide information. Selected customers who are interested in purchasing a Ford vehicle (deemed to be in-market), will be encouraged to submit their contact information and opt-in to receive communications from Ford of Canada. By doing so, these customers may be eligible to receive the Auto Show Bonus.

IMPORTANT: Not every customer that opts-in to receive marketing communications from Ford of Canada will receive an Auto Show Bonus or be eligible to receive an Auto Show Bonus. A selection of customers that opt-in will not receive (or be eligible for) the offer. Only customers that receive the Auto Show Bonus will be eligible.

IMPORTANT: The $750 incentive will be jointly funded by Ford of Canada and Ford of Canada Dealerships. Ford of Canada will contribute $500 of the customer incentive amount. The Dealer contribution will be $250 for each incentive claim.

The customer may use the offer as a down payment or choose to receive a rebate cheque from Ford of Canada.

Only one Auto Show Bonus may be applied toward the purchase or lease of an eligible vehicle.

The offer may only be redeemed once.

No mechanically or otherwise reproduced certificates will be accepted.

Taxes payable before savings deducted. 


ELIGIBLE CUSTOMERS

Selected Canadian residents who attend one of the 2019 Canadian Auto Shows will receive a $750 Auto Show Bonus, provided they:

- Visit the Ford display and provide their contact information (information collected via an iPad provided by on-site CSRs). Individuals must opt-in to receive marketing communications from Ford and provide their full mailing and e-mail address to receive the offer.

- Purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle during the program period.

Customers that do not submit their information via the on-site registration process, do not opt-in to receive marketing communications, do not provide their complete contact information, or are not randomly selected to receive a Canadian Auto Show Bonus Offer will not receive the offer and will not be eligible for the Auto Show Bonus. No exceptions or add-ons will be permitted.

Not every individual that opts-in to receive marketing communications from Ford of Canada will receive an Auto Show Bonus, nor will they be eligible to receive an Auto Show Bonus. Only selected customers that opt-in will receive the Auto Show Bonus. Only customers that receive the Auto Show Bonus, via email, will be eligible for the offer.

Eligibility can be checked in Smart VINCENT and ConsumerLINK.

Due to privacy concerns, only customers can submit their information via the registration process (iPad form completion). Dealership personnel are not to enter customer information on behalf of the customer. 


AUTO SHOW BONUS DISTRIBUTION

An email that communicates the Auto Show Bonus Offer will be sent to selected customers within 24 hours from the time they submit their information via the registration process. Only selected customers that opt-in to receive communications may receive the Auto Show Bonus certificate. (Note: Not all customers that opt-in to receive offers from Ford of Canada will receive the Auto Show Bonus). 


DEALER PARTICIPATION / CONTRIBUTION

Ford of Canada Dealers will be responsible for covering $250 of the total Auto Show Bonus amount by claiming dealer charge program 99103 first in Smart Vincent.

Participation in the Auto Show Bonus program is completely voluntary.

Dealers choosing to participate in the program agree to offer all eligible customers (that purchase an eligible vehicle during the program period) a $750 Auto Show Bonus incentive by claiming the correct Auto Show program (noted in Vincent program # section.). Dealer to include the customer's Certificate Number.

Dealer will be responsible for contributing $250 toward the customer incentive amount (via claiming program 99103 $250 charge as a pre-requisite to claiming the applicable Auto Show program).

Claiming the Ford of Canada contribution on any one vehicle constitutes a Dealer's agreement to participate in the program for all eligible deliveries for the duration of the program. 

Eligible Delivery Types:  6, 7, A, E, 9, 0, X, J, 1, 8, L, K, O, R, P

19342.consumer: 2019 Mobility Plus (#32238).  Standard Rules of Eligibility Apply.  Any Canadian resident who is physically challenged and requires the installation of adaptive driving aids or mobility assistance equipment are eligible.  Eligible customers must present a record of their physically challenged condition in the form of a doctor's note or government certificate.  Contact your local dealer for full program details.  Some restrictions/conditions may apply.
19342.dealer:
2019 Mobility Plus

The Mobility Program is designed to financially assist physically challenged individuals with a rebate of up to $1,000 toward the installation of adaptive driving aids or mobility assistance equipment in their new Ford of Canada vehicles.

The modifications on vehicles for this industry, whether they are the installation of adaptive devices and driving aids or structural modifications, must be carried out in such a manner that maintains the integrity and safety that was originally designed into each Ford vehicle.

It will be through adherence to these modification guidelines that we will be able to gain assurances from the various modifiers that the completed vehicles remain compliant with all Canadian Motor Vehicle Safety Standards. This will ensure that the mobility client receives a quality vehicle which has been modified by a company with the necessary compliance requirements.

Important Reminder: Mobility claims will be paid to an individual customer only. Claims made under Company names will be rejected and payment will not be issued. 

Reimbursement of up to $1,000 for costs incurred for adaptive driving aids or mobility assistance equipment.

Vehicle modification must be completed within six months of vehicle delivery.

Only modifications made by an approved conversion company will be eligible for the Ford Mobility Program. A Safety Compliance Certification Form, that must be completed, can be found on the Forms tab on DRIVE.


ELIGIBLE MODIFICATIONS & EQUIPMENT

Adaptive driving aids or mobility assistance equipment: 

-  Wheelchair lifts or other lift equipment

-  Hand or other driving controls

-  Door Openers

-  Lifts

-  Parking Brakes

-  Power Assisted Seats

-  Steering Devices

-  Wheelchair Restraints

Any other claims are subject to the prior approval of Ford of Canada. 


INELIGIBLE MODIFICATIONS & EQUIPMENT

The purpose of the Mobility Program is to provide support for physically challenged customers who require the installation of special adaptive driving aids or mobility assistance equipment to be able to drive or travel as a passenger in their vehicle. The program is not intended to provide financial assistance for the purpose of additional comfort or convenience.

The following modifications/equipment are not eligible for reimbursement: 

-  Factory Installed Options/Accessories

-  BackCycler Lumbar Products or similar back supports, rests, or massage units

-  Ford Dealership Installed Accessories or Equipment

Contact Dealer Claims Payment (1-800-387-7944) for eligibility concerns. 


APPROVED CONVERSION COMPANIES

IMPORTANT! Only modifications made by an approved conversion company will be eligible for the Mobility Program.

To be eligible for reimbursement, eligible equipment must be installed by either:

-  Ford Quality Vehicle Modifier (QVM) participant (required for structural vehicle modifications)

-  National Mobility Equipment Dealer Association (NMEDA) member

-  Modifier holding current National Safety Mark (NSM) with Transport Canada

As part of the claiming process, a Compliance Claim form must accompany each Ford Mobility claim submission. Refer to Forms Tab

So what are the requirements?

We require that the installation of the Vehicle Accessibility equipment or Driving Aids must be performed by a company that is either: 

-  A participant in the Ford Mobility Quality Vehicle Modifier Program (QVM)

-  Or a National Mobility Equipment Dealer Association (NMEDA) member

-  Or said company must be able to provide their National Safety Mark and provide a statement from an officer of the company as evidence of training in the installation of the applicable accessibility equipment and/or driving aids.

-  If the modification Company has sub-contracted these services from a third party, they must identify the QVM status of the company or provide the National Safety Mark and a statement related to the evidence of training in the installation of the applicable mobility equipment.

-  If the subcontracted vehicle conversion services are provided by a company from outside Canada, the claimant must provide evidence that the conversion is eligible for importation by identifying that the manufacturer is listed on Transport Canada's Pre-Clearance list for the specific adaptive conversion that was undertaken.


INCENTIVE CLAIMING / ADMINISTRATION

Dealers may manually claim Mobility program benefits under Program #32238 by returning a completed copy of the Mobility program claim form along with supporting documents (see below) to Dealer Claims Payment.

Supporting Documents:

-  A completed copy of the claim form signed by the customer. Refer to Forms Tab

-  A record of the equipment installation invoice with work order

-  A copy of a doctor's note or government certificate describing the customers physically challenged condition

-  A completed copy of the Ford Mobility Motoring Compliance Claim Form. Refer to Forms Tab

Supporting documents must be kept at the dealership for audit purposes.

Note: Mobility claims will be paid to an individual customer only. Claims made under Company names will be rejected and payment will not be issued. 

Eligible Delivery Types:  6, A, 9, 0, X, J, 1, 8, K O, R, P
19342.title: 2019 Mobility Plus

17160.dealer:

IMPORTANT: The $750 incentive will be jointly funded by Ford of Canada and Ford of Canada Dealerships. Ford of Canada will contribute $500 of the customer incentive amount. The Dealer contribution will be $250 for each incentive claim.

The customer may use the offer as a down payment or choose to receive a rebate cheque from Ford of Canada.

Only one Auto Show Bonus may be applied toward the purchase or lease of an eligible vehicle.

The offer may only be redeemed once.

No mechanically or otherwise reproduced certificates will be accepted.

Taxes payable before savings deducted. 


ELIGIBLE CUSTOMERS

Selected Canadian residents who attend one of the 2019 Canadian Auto Shows will receive a $750 Auto Show Bonus, provided they:

- Visit the Ford display and provide their contact information (information collected via an iPad provided by on-site CSRs). Individuals must opt-in to receive marketing communications from Ford and provide their full mailing and e-mail address to receive the offer.

- Purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle during the program period.

Customers that do not submit their information via the on-site registration process, do not opt-in to receive marketing communications, do not provide their complete contact information, or are not randomly selected to receive a Canadian Auto Show Bonus Offer will not receive the offer and will not be eligible for the Auto Show Bonus. No exceptions or add-ons will be permitted.

Not every individual that opts-in to receive marketing communications from Ford of Canada will receive an Auto Show Bonus, nor will they be eligible to receive an Auto Show Bonus. Only selected customers that opt-in will receive the Auto Show Bonus. Only customers that receive the Auto Show Bonus, via email, will be eligible for the offer.

Eligibility can be checked in Smart VINCENT and ConsumerLINK.

Due to privacy concerns, only customers can submit their information via the registration process (iPad form completion). Dealership personnel are not to enter customer information on behalf of the customer. 


AUTO SHOW BONUS DISTRIBUTION

An email that communicates the Auto Show Bonus Offer will be sent to selected customers within 24 hours from the time they submit their information via the registration process. Only selected customers that opt-in to receive communications may receive the Auto Show Bonus certificate. (Note: Not all customers that opt-in to receive offers from Ford of Canada will receive the Auto Show Bonus). 


DEALER PARTICIPATION / CONTRIBUTION

Ford of Canada Dealers will be responsible for covering $250 of the total Auto Show Bonus amount by claiming dealer charge program 99103 first in Smart Vincent.

Participation in the Auto Show Bonus program is completely voluntary.

Dealers choosing to participate in the program agree to offer all eligible customers (that purchase an eligible vehicle during the program period) a $750 Auto Show Bonus incentive by claiming the correct Auto Show program (noted in Vincent program # section.). Dealer to include the customer's Certificate Number.

Dealer will be responsible for contributing $250 toward the customer incentive amount (via claiming program 99103 $250 charge as a pre-requisite to claiming the applicable Auto Show program).

Claiming the Ford of Canada contribution on any one vehicle constitutes a Dealer's agreement to participate in the program for all eligible deliveries for the duration of the program. 

Eligible Delivery Types:  6, 7, A, E, 9, 0, X, J, 1, 8, L, K, O, R, P

18113.dealer:
GM Canada is pleased to announce the renewal of the Welcome to Canada Bonus. This is a $1,000 
manufacturer-to-consumer bonus (tax inclusive) available to eligible new immigrants living in Canada with 
valid Permanent Resident cards or Temporary Foreign Workers with valid temporary work permits. The 
Welcome to Canada Bonus is intended to provide a promotable message to attract additional prospects to 
your dealerships and can be used to reduce the purchase price or down payment requirements often made 
of immigrants who are working to establish credit in Canada.

Note: Foreign students are eligible for the Student Bonus Program.

Call 1-800-GM-DRIVE for further assistance on the Welcome to Canada Bonus.

ELIGIBLE INDIVIDUALS:
- All Individuals who hold a valid Permanent Residence Card or Temporary Workers with a valid work permit:
I. Permanent Resident Card
- Permanent Residents are defined by Citizenship and Immigration Canada (CIC)
- The Permanent Resident Card, often referred to as a PR Card, is issued by CIC and is the official proof

II. Temporary Foreign Workers

permit
OTHER REQUIREMENTS:

or financing/leasing co-signer (financial documentation must be provided to prove co-signing eligibility).
- A person is considered and eligible under the provisions of this program only once in his or her lifetime.

U.S. vehicles may be used as loyalty VINs only, but may not be resold on a MINI FS contract. Family members residing in the same household as the eligible customer may receive loyalty benefits on their qualifying purchase. Eligible customers may reuse their qualifying loyalty VIN on their future purchases to receive loyalty benefits (subject to availability). BMW Group Canada reserves the right to change or terminate this program at any time.


In the case of inter-brand loyalty, the loyalty program for the new vehicle will apply (e.g. MINI Customer purchasing BMW receives the BMW loyalty offer). This program does not apply to the sale of pre-owned vehicles. Loyalty options cannot be combined. For example, a customer cannot use both the loyalty rate discount and the loyalty credit. Drive Your Brand (DYB) and other BMW internal programs are ineligible. U.S. vehicles may be used as loyalty VINs only, but may not be resold on a BMW FS contract. Family members residing in the same household as the eligible customer may receive loyalty benefits on their qualifying purchase. Eligible customers may reuse their qualifying loyalty VIN on their future purchases to receive loyalty benefits (subject to availability). BMW Group Canada reserves the right to change or terminate this program at any time.

20543.consumer: Ford Toronto Auto Show Bonus (#32217).  Standard Rules of Eligibility Apply.  Selected Canadian residents who attend one of the 2019 Canadian Auto Shows will receive a $750 Auto Show Bonus, provided they visit the Ford display and provide their contact information.  Individuals must opt-in to receive marketing communications for Ford and provide their full mailing and e-mail address to receive the offer.  Customers who do not submit their information via the on-site registration process, do not opt-in to receive marketing communications, do not provide their complete contact information, or are not randomly selected to receive a Canadian Auto Show Bonus Offer will not receive the offer and will not be eligible for the Auto Show Bonus.  Only customers that receive the Auto Show Bonus, via email, will be eligible for the offer.  Limit one per household.  Must redeem using original offer; no mechanically or otherwise reproduced certificates will be accepted.  Prior purchases not eligible.  Contact your local dealer for full program details.  Some restrictions/conditions may apply.
20543.dealer:
Ford Toronto Auto Show Bonus

The Ford Auto Show Bonus will be available to selected customers that opt-in to receive marketing communications from Ford (via Customer Service Representative Registration), receive the offer via e-mail, and who purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle during the applicable Auto Show program period.

Customer Service Representatives (CSRs) will be on-site to assist customers with questions and provide information. Selected customers who are interested in purchasing a Ford vehicle (deemed to be in-market), will be encouraged to submit their contact information and opt-in to receive communications from Ford of Canada. By doing so, these customers may be eligible to receive the Auto Show Bonus.

IMPORTANT: Not every customer that opts-in to receive marketing communications from Ford of Canada will receive an Auto Show Bonus or be eligible to receive an Auto Show Bonus. A selection of customers that opt-in will not receive (or be eligible for) the offer. Only customers that receive the Auto Show Bonus will be eligible.

IMPORTANT: The $750 incentive will be jointly funded by Ford of Canada and Ford of Canada Dealerships. Ford of Canada will contribute $500 of the customer incentive amount. The Dealer contribution will be $250 for each incentive claim.

The customer may use the offer as a down payment or choose to receive a rebate cheque from Ford of Canada.

Only one Auto Show Bonus may be applied toward the purchase or lease of an eligible vehicle.

The offer may only be redeemed once.

No mechanically or otherwise reproduced certificates will be accepted.

Taxes payable before savings deducted. 


ELIGIBLE CUSTOMERS

Selected Canadian residents who attend one of the 2019 Canadian Auto Shows will receive a $750 Auto Show Bonus, provided they:

- Visit the Ford display and provide their contact information (information collected via an iPad provided by on-site CSRs). Individuals must opt-in to receive marketing communications from Ford and provide their full mailing and e-mail address to receive the offer.

- Purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle during the program period.

Customers that do not submit their information via the on-site registration process, do not opt-in to receive marketing communications, do not provide their complete contact information, or are not randomly selected to receive a Canadian Auto Show Bonus Offer will not receive the offer and will not be eligible for the Auto Show Bonus. No exceptions or add-ons will be permitted.

Not every individual that opts-in to receive marketing communications from Ford of Canada will receive an Auto Show Bonus, nor will they be eligible to receive an Auto Show Bonus. Only selected customers that opt-in will receive the Auto Show Bonus. Only customers that receive the Auto Show Bonus, via email, will be eligible for the offer.

Eligibility can be checked in Smart VINCENT and ConsumerLINK.

Due to privacy concerns, only customers can submit their information via the registration process (iPad form completion). Dealership personnel are not to enter customer information on behalf of the customer. 


AUTO SHOW BONUS DISTRIBUTION

An email that communicates the Auto Show Bonus Offer will be sent to selected customers within 24 hours from the time they submit their information via the registration process. Only selected customers that opt-in to receive communications may receive the Auto Show Bonus certificate. (Note: Not all customers that opt-in to receive offers from Ford of Canada will receive the Auto Show Bonus). 


DEALER PARTICIPATION / CONTRIBUTION

Ford of Canada Dealers will be responsible for covering $250 of the total Auto Show Bonus amount by claiming dealer charge program 99103 first in Smart Vincent.

Participation in the Auto Show Bonus program is completely voluntary.

Dealers choosing to participate in the program agree to offer all eligible customers (that purchase an eligible vehicle during the program period) a $750 Auto Show Bonus incentive by claiming the correct Auto Show program (noted in Vincent program # section.). Dealer to include the customer's Certificate Number.

Dealer will be responsible for contributing $250 toward the customer incentive amount (via claiming program 99103 $250 charge as a pre-requisite to claiming the applicable Auto Show program).

Claiming the Ford of Canada contribution on any one vehicle constitutes a Dealer's agreement to participate in the program for all eligible deliveries for the duration of the program. 

Eligible Delivery Types:  6, 7, A, E, 9, 0, X, J, 1, 8, L, K, O, R, P
20543.title: Ford Toronto Auto Show Bonus

4419.dealer:
Delivery Allowance

The Delivery Allowance is a discount from Ford of Canada to Ford of Canada Dealers (not directly to End Users) and should not be referred to as a discount given to the End User and may only be claimed on eligible vehicles sold during the program period.  

In all cases, 100% of the Delivery Allowance must be passed onto the customer.  The selling price on the End User's Buyer's Agreement should be shown as the amount net of the offered Delivery Allowance.  

The intent is to reduce the vehicle-selling price to the End User by the amount of the offered Delivery Allowance. 

Dealers are required to maintain in the deal jacket a completed Form 8402D.  This is a mandatory form required for auditing purposes.

10713.dealer:
Delivery Allowance

The Delivery Allowance is a discount from Ford of Canada to Ford of Canada Dealers (not directly to End Users) and should not be referred to as a discount given to the End User and may only be claimed on eligible vehicles sold during the program period.  

In all cases, 100% of the Delivery Allowance must be passed onto the customer.  The selling price on the End User's Buyer's Agreement should be shown as the amount net of the offered Delivery Allowance.  

The intent is to reduce the vehicle-selling price to the End User by the amount of the offered Delivery Allowance. 

Dealers are required to maintain in the deal jacket a completed Form 8402D.  This is a mandatory form required for auditing purposes.

19407.consumer:
NCF Advantage Program assists individuals who have faced credit challenges in the past or need an opportunity to establish credit for the first time. It is stackable with all other programs except Nissan 1st Choice Grad Program and Standard Rate Program. BCF also offers a flat dealer reserve on all contracts. 
Advantage Program Eligible Models: Current MY (as per latest C&I Bulletin) Micra, Versa Note, Sentra, Altima, Rogue, Qashqai. 
Advantage Ultra Low KM Lease: Current MY Rogue
Eligible Sales: Loan - G, Lease - R
Rates: Current C&I Grids + 4%. 
Max Terms: Loan - 72mo, Lease - 64mo
Down Payment: Minimum $1500 cash down payment or security deposit (must be customer CASH only!) 
Credit Guidelines: 
PTI maximum 15% 
TDSR equal/less than 35%
Max finance amount: $30,000 
All applicants will be considered regardless of credit bureau history
Proof of income (POI) required upfront, income must be full time employment with minimum 3mos on the job
Completed application with 1 reference
Non-landed customers (9 SIN#) are required to submit job contract & work permit.

The full value of the monthly payment(s) as debited from the customerx2019s account, including taxes, will be reimbursed. Retailer participation equivalent to one monthx2019s payment on maturing vehicle is mandatory. Payments eligible for reimbursement is determined at time of Retailer Buyout or successful Grounding. Each returning leased vehicle can only be associated with 1 lease pull-ahead benefit. Each new vehicle transaction can only be associated with 1 lease pull-ahead benefit. Lessees are responsible for contractual lease obligations such as overdue payments, late charges, excess wear & tear charges, excess kilometer charges, outstanding tickets, etc. U.S. vehicles, Single-Pay Leases (SPL), Drive Your Brand (DYB), and promotional contracts are not eligible. This offer may not be used on any Pre-Owned or Refinance purchase.

5531.consumer: Focus and Fiesta Trade Up Program (#32234).  Standard Rules of Eligibility Apply.  Only original owners/lessees of a 2011-2015 Model Ford Fiesta or a 2012-2015 Model Ford Focus will be eligible for this trade up incentive, provided they trade in their current vehicle and purchase or lease an eligible Ford vehicle.  Canadian Residents Only.  Limit one per household.  Customers that have claimed a previously offered Focus/Fiesta loyalty incentive will not be eligible.  Contact your local dealer for full program details.  Some restrictions/conditions may apply.
5531.dealer:
Focus and Fiesta Trade Up Program

Ford of Canada will be offering a trade up incentive to select Focus and Fiesta customers (see eligibility below) that trade in their current vehicle (2011-2015 Model Fiesta or a 2012-2015 Model Focus) and purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle during the program period.

Customer Eligibility Clarification - 

-  Only original owners/lessees of a 2011-2015 Model Fiesta or a 2012-2015 Model Focus will be eligible for this trade up incentive, provided they trade in their current vehicle and purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle during the program period.

-  Eligible VIN's may be checked in Smart VINCENT, however, the customer name must match that of the original owner/lessee of the qualifying Fiesta or Focus.


The customer may use the incentive as a down payment or choose to receive a rebate cheque from Ford of Canada.

- $500 toward the purchase or lease of a new Focus, Fiesta or CMAX

- $1,000 toward the purchase or lease of a new Fusion or EcoSport

- $1,000 toward the purchase or lease of a new Escape S/SE

- $2,000 toward the purchase or lease of a new Escape SEL/Titanium

- $2,000 toward the purchase or lease of any other Ford or Lincoln Vehicle - (Restrictions May Apply)

Note:  Customers that have claimed a previously offered Focus/Fiesta loyalty incentive offer will not be eligible.  Only one trade in offer may be applied toward the purchase or lease of an eligible vehicle, and the offer may only be redeemed once.

This offer is NOT eligible for incentive protection.  Customers must take delivery of an eligible new Ford or Lincoln, during the program period, to be eligible for the offer. 

Eligible Delivery Types: 6, 7, A, E, 9, 0, X, J, 1, 8, L, K, O, R, P


REQUIRED SUPPORTING DOCUMENTATION - 

Dealers are required to keep the following documentation in the customer deal jacket:

Copy of the customer's provincial record of ownership/registration for their qualifying Focus/Fiesta.  The address on the ownership must match the address on the new Buyer's Agreement for the new vehicle purchase.  

NOTE: For provinces where addresses are not indicated on the vehicle registration/ownership, only the address on the driver's license must match the address on the new Buyer's Agreement, and the license/file number on the ownership must match the license/file on the driver's license.

The customer must provide proof of ownership AND proof that the vehicle has been registered or insured (in Canada) in the customer's name for a minimum of the last 3 months to qualify for the incentive.  

All documentation must be kept in the customer deal jacket for audit purposes.

A completed copy of the Customer Cash claim form (generated from Smart VINCENT), signed by the customer, must also be kept in the customer deal jacket.

Post program audits WILL be conducted at the conclusion of the program.
5531.title: Focus and Fiesta Trade Up Program

Eligible Delivery Types: 6, 7, A, E, 9, 0, X, J, 1, 8, L, K, O, R, P


ELIGIBLE CUSTOMERS - 

Owners and lessees of a 2011-2015 Model Fiesta or a 2012-2015 Model Focus will be eligible for this trade up incentive, provided they trade in their current vehicle and purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle during the program period.

Customers that have claimed a previously offered Focus/Fiesta loyalty incentive offer will not be eligible.

Fleet customers are NOT eligible for this incentive.


REQUIRED SUPPORTING DOCUMENTATION - 

Dealers are required to keep the following documentation in the customer deal jacket:

Copy of the customer's provincial record of ownership/registration for their qualifying Focus/Fiesta.  The address on the ownership must match the address on the new Buyer's Agreement for the new vehicle purchase.  

NOTE: For provinces where addresses are not indicated on the vehicle registration/ownership, only the address on the driver's license must match the address on the new Buyer's Agreement, and the license/file number on the ownership must match the license/file on the driver's license.

The customer must provide proof of ownership AND proof that the vehicle has been registered or insured (in Canada) in the customer's name for a minimum of the last 3 months to qualify for the incentive.  

All documentation must be kept in the customer deal jacket for audit purposes.

A completed copy of the Customer Cash claim form (generated from Smart VINCENT), signed by the customer, must also be kept in the customer deal jacket.

Post program audits WILL be conducted at the conclusion of the program.
5528.title: Focus and Fiesta Trade Up Program

Limited time cash offers available to eligible customers, while supplies last, on qualifying new and previously unregistered Audi models. Dealer may sell/lease for less. Time sensitive offers are subject to change or cancellation without notice. Dealer order/trade may be necessary. Not all customers will qualify.

Whox2019s Eligible?
1) Current Audi Finance customer (lease or finance) or customers who have terminated an Audi Finance lease or finance contract within the past 90 days.
2) Current owner of a 2011MY Audi vehicle or newer.

Cash Loyalty Credit: For loyal cash purchase customers, Audi Canada is pleased to offer an Audi Loyalty Cash Credit. The Cash credit is not combinable with subvented/special lease or finance rates offered by Audi Finance. However, it is combinable with Audi Finance Standard Rates.

Cash Purchase:
 For eligible customers purchasing through the cash channel, the Audi Loyalty Cash Credit is available.
 Current and valid proof of ownership must be provided in order to be eligible for the Audi Loyalty Cash Credit. Ownership of the current vehicle must be in the name of the customer or immediate family member in same household.
 The Audi Loyalty Cash Credit must be applied and clearly shown on the Sales Agreement in order to receive Audi Canada Credit Support.
 Loyalty Rate Reduction and/or Special Rates offered by Audi Canada and Audi Finance cannot be combined with the Audi Loyalty Cash Credit.
 This program requires claim form and supporting documentation submission to ACIC. Please refer to the x2018terms and conditionsx2019 and x2018dealer responsibility for cash purchase loyalty customersx2019 sections in this bulletin for further details.

NCF Special Lease or Finance Cash is a Manufacturer-to-Dealer discount that applies solely to promotional Lease and Finance transactions, respectively. 3497.consumer:
The Offer
1)1% Rate Reduction: This program provides eligible Audi Owners with a 1.0% rate reduction on all posted rates when leasing or financing a new vehicle through Audi Finance. This special rate is supported by 75 bps from Audi Canada and 25 bps Audi Finance, dealer participation is not required for the rate reduction program.

Details:
1) Lease and Finance Purchase:
 For eligible (as defined above) customers who purchase via the Lease or Finance channels, a 1% loyalty rate reduction is available. For full details and claiming instructions, please refer to Audi Finance bulletin CA701-002M Owner Loyalty Program. This program will be administered by Audi Finance and does not require any claim submission to Incentives Desk. Please note for customers utilizing the special Audi Finance lease or finance rates, the 1% rate reduction program (if applicable) must be used. Special lease/finance rates are not combinable with the Audi Loyalty Cash credits.

The Audi Owner Loyalty Rate Reduction and Audi Loyalty Cash program applies towards the sale of new, unregistered, and previously unreported 2018MY Audi vehicles that are reported sold in OMD Web during the program period. Both OMD Web Delivery Date and vehicle Reported Date must be within the program period.

Terms and Conditions
1. Program Details
 New Vehicle Purchase (Lease or Finance Channel): 1.0% discount off the applicable Special rate when leased or financed through Audi Finance.
 -The loyalty interest rate will not be below 0%.
 -Current Audi Finance customers will receive the added benefit of a Security Deposit Waiver.
 -The customer contract date for the replacement vehicle must fall within the program eligibility date.
 -Upselling of the Audi Owner Loyalty Program Rate is not permitted.

Combining Programs
- Customers who are currently participating in the Audi Ambassador 1% Lease Program, Business Fleet Program, or Diplomat Purchase Program are not eligible for the Audi Owner Loyalty Program.
- Customers participating in the Audi Ambassador 1% Lease Program, Business Fleet Program, or Diplomat Purchase Program for the replacement vehicle are ineligible for the Audi Owner Loyalty Program.
 This incentive cannot be combined with
- Any other Audi Canada Loyalty offer
- Audi Service Loaner Program
- Audi Brand Ambassador Programs
- Any Audi Conquest Programs

Loyalty Program Model Eligibility
- New: All new, unregistered and previously unreported 2018MY Audi vehicles.

Customer Eligibility
- Current Audi Finance customer
- Account Eligibility: Previous VIN Account must be in good standing.
- Audi Finance Customer with recently terminated lease or finance contract:
- Customers who have terminated a lease or finance contract within the past 90 days remain eligible for the Audi Owner Loyalty Program.
- Customer must provide Proof of Current and Valid Ownership of the current vehicle in the name of the customer or immediate family member in same household.
- Rate Protection Program does not apply. Customer must take delivery of their new vehicle within 90 days of the Audi Finance contract termination date of the previous vehicle. The time frame will not be extended beyond the 90 day period, even for factory orders.
- Audi Owner, but not current Audi Finance customer:
- Previous vehicle must be from 2011MY-2018MY
- Customer must provide Proof of Current and Valid Ownership of the current vehicle in the name of the customer or immediate family member in same household.
 Documentation Required: Current and valid vehicle registration issued from a Canadian Provincial Ministry of Transportation, accompanied with both sides of the ownership, clearly identifying that the vehicle is plated in Canada   for the current year.

10143.dealer:
Cash buyers may be eligible for incentive cash on select models. Please refer to the program rule for full details on the non-stackable cash and how it can be combined with other programs. This is a Manufacturer-to-Dealer discount; must be applied as a reduction to the actual selling price before taxes

Sale type O, Subclass A,Q,J,W,Z

Non-Stackable Dollar cash incentive cannot be used in conjunction with the NCF Special Rate Lease or Finance programs. The Non-Stackable Dollar and NCF Standard Rate Lease or Finance Cash must be applied as a reduction to the actual selling price before taxes. Dealers must enter the correct Sale Type and Subclass (see table below) when retailing the unit in the system in order to be accurately reimbursed by Nissan Canada or to prevent any chargebacks should records be audited in the future. Please note Nissan Canada will reimburse the Dealer the applicable cash incentive amount plus taxes (i.e. GST/HST, QST), or process a chargeback if required, through VIMS. The GST/HST, QST must then be remitted to the respective taxing authorities. Dealerships must ensure that the proper subclass is applied to the vehicle.

The monthly program grids clearly outline which vehicles are eligible for the Non-Stackable Dollar and NCF Standard Rate Cash incentives. If the grid does not reflect any Non-Stackable Dollar or NCF Standard Rate Cash on a specific model or trim, it means the Non-Stackable Dollar or NCF Standard Rate Cash incentive is not available on that specific model or trim and should be communicated as such to the customer. For clarity, where a model is identified as having no Non-Stackable Dollar or NCF Standard Rate Cash incentives, it is not eligible for any Non-Stackable Dollar or NCF Standard Rate Cash under any circumstances.

309.consumer:
GM Student Bonus Discount: Eligible students will receive an incentive of $500 to $750 tax inclusive (model dependent), 
towards the purchase / lease / finance of an eligible new Chevrolet, Buick, GMC or Cadillac. 
This offer may not be redeemed for cash and may not be combined with certain other consumer incentives.
 Conditions and limitations apply. GM Canada reserves the right to amend or terminate offers for any reason in whole or in part at any time
 without prior notice. Void where prohibited. See dealer for details.
309.dealer:
GM Canada is pleased to announce the renewal of the Student Bonus Discount Program. This program is available to eligible students up to FOUR YEARS after graduation. Our
ability to attract high school, college and university educated students is integral to our future success.

Proof of student eligibility must be provided as part of the Documentation Requirements / Audit Package

ELIGIBLE INDIVIDUALS:
All students currently enrolled in, or recent graduates from:
i) High School
- Must be a full-time student at a recognized high school, or
- Must have graduated from a full-time recognized high school program within the last four (4) years.
Eligibility period will be measured from the date shown on the graduatex2019s diploma.

ii) Accredited College
- Part-time and full time students (working towards a diploma for a program consisting of the
equivalent of two years or 16 months of in class study) or
- Must have graduated from an accredited part-time or full-time College within the last four (4)
years. Eligibility period will be measured from the date shown on the graduatex2019s diploma
iii) Accredited University or CEGEP
- Part-time and full time students (working towards a diploma for a program consisting of the
equivalent of two years or 16 months of in class study) or
- Must have graduated from an accredited part-time or full-time University or CEGEP, within the
last four (4) years. Eligibility period will be measured from the date shown on the graduatex2019s
diploma.
iv) Adult and Vocational Centres
- Part-time and full time students (working towards a diploma for a program consisting of the
equivalent of two years or 16 months of in class study) or
- Must have graduated from an accredited part-time or full-time Adult and Vocational program
within the last four (4) years. Eligibility period will be measured from the date shown on the
graduatex2019s diploma.
- Individuals who reside in Canada and meet the eligibility requirements above from an accredited
institution in the United States may be eligible, providing they meet requirements of "Eligible
Individuals" described above.
- The Automotive Service Educational Program (ASEP) in which students spend a portion of the term
working in GM dealerships is eligible.
- Apprenticeship programs are eligible (enrolled or graduated).
- For CEGEP in Quebec, the DEC technical program is eligible.
- Certificate Programs consisting of 1 year or less are not eligible.
OTHER REQUIREMENTS:
- Students must have a valid Canadian driverx2019s license to be eligible.
- Vehicles must be registered in the name of the eligible student and can be co-titled with
their spouse, another eligible student, or financing/leasing co-signer (financial
documentation must be provided to prove co-signing eligibility).
- Age of majority may be required in some provinces.
- A person is considered a x2018studentx2019 and eligible under the provisions of this program only
once in his or her lifetime.
PLEASE NOTE:
Call 1-800-GM-DRIVE for further assistance on the Student Bonus Program.
DETERMINING RECOGNIZED AND ACCREDITED INSTITUTIONS:
- "Recognized high schools" refers to educational institutions offering educational programs
at least up to grade 12 in English Canada and Secondary 5 (Secondaire 5) in Quebec.
- "Accredited colleges and universities" refers to educational institutions offering educational
programs consisting of a minimum of two years (16 months in class) study. Condensed programs
at the same institution are acceptable (e.g. Executive MBA).
- Accredited high schools, colleges, universities and CEGEP are defined as institutions that are
recognized by the following provincial or territorial government bodies as being a x201Cbona fidex201D
educational institution that adheres to provincial or territorial government standards:

BC: Ministry of Education & Ministry of Advanced Education
Alberta: Alberta Education & Alberta Advanced Education and Technology
Saskatchewan: Saskatchewan Learning
Manitoba: Department of Education, Citizenship and Youth & Department of Advanced Education
and Training
Ontario: Ministry of Education & Ministry of Training, Colleges, and Universities
Quebec: Ministry of Education, Recreation, and Sports
New Brunswick: Department of Education & Department of Training and Employment Development
Nova Scotia: Department of Education
Newfoundland & Labrador: Department of Education
PEI: Department of Education
NWT: Department of Education, Culture and Employment
Yukon: Department of Education
Nunavut: Department of Education
Accredited Universities, Colleges and High Schools in the United States that meet the Canadian criteria may
also be eligible. 
This offer may not be redeemed for cash and may not be combined with certain other consumer incentives.
 Conditions and limitations apply. GM Canada reserves the right to amend or terminate offers for any reason in whole or in part at any time
 without prior notice. Void where prohibited. See dealer for details.
309.title: GM Student Bonus Discount

8726.consumer: Non-Stackable Cash Purchase Assistance (71213). See dealer for details.
8726.dealer:
Non-Stackable Cash Purchase Assistance

Non-Stackable Cash Purchase Assistance is a discount from Ford of Canada to Ford of Canada Dealers (not directly to customers) and should not be referred to as a discount given to the customer. 

The selling price on the customer's buyer's agreement should be shown as the amount net of the offered Non-Stackable Cash Purchase Assistance Incentive. The intent is to reduce the vehicle-selling price to the customer by the full amount (100%) of the offered Non-Stackable Cash incentive. 

INCENTIVE CLAIMING INSTRUCTIONS - 

Ford Customers Financing Through Ford Credit

Dealerships will be required to enter the Non-Stackable rebate in RouteOne in order for the effective APR to populate on the contract. The effective APR is determined by calculating the cost of financing and including the foregone cash (non-stackable cash) incentive. The rebate is entered in the Total Down Payment section of RouteOne under the line; MEMO: Rebate Available to Cash Customers. It will be the Dealer's responsibility to ensure it is completed accurately.

Prepayments by Retail Customers:

Although the Non-Stackable Cash Purchase Assistance Incentive is included in the "Total cost of Credit" or "Cost of borrowing" of the applicable Addendum, such cash is not a non-interest finance charge under applicable law. If the Retail Customer should prepay in full the Retail Instalment Contract, that customer WILL NOT be entitled to a refund of any portion of the Non-Stackable Cash.

Dealers MUST NOT communicate anything to customers that is contrary to this position.
8726.title: Non-Stackable Cash Purchace Assistance

330.dealer:
The Scotiabank GM Visa Card Program

The Scotiabank GM Visa Business Card is now available, allowing a small business customer to apply for a
credit card in its business name.
GM Visa Business Cardholders who have an existing No Fee Card or Infinite Card are able to combine their GM
Earnings with their GM Visa Business Card Earnings.
Please note: Cardholders who have more than one personal card are not able to combine or pool Earnings from
more than one personal card. To combine the GM Earnings, both the GM Visa Business Cars and the personal GM
Card must be in the name of the same Cardholder. Business Cardholders must call the GM Card Redemption
Centre to request the transfer of Earnings at time of redemption.
Please visit the GM Card Page on the GC Marketing Hub for more information on how to apply for the Cards,
customer videos, training guides and product overviews.

1. The GM Card Earnings accumulated under this program may be redeemed by GM Card members towards the
purchase price or lease down payment of an eligible new GM vehicle. There is no limit on the amount of the
GM Card Earnings that may be applied to any eligible new GM vehicle.
2. Dealers may call the GM Card DEALER Redemption Centre at 1.800.947.8877 for questions, concerns and
suggestions. This support line is NOT to be used for consumer calls.
3. Consumers may call the GM Card Redemption Centre at 1.888.446.6232 with questions related to the GM Card
Earnings and redemption process.
4. Program benefits are offered at the sole discretion of GM Canada. To participate, an eligible customer
must:
i) Be a named user of a GM Card
ii) Be an individual, and
iii) Reside in Canada
This offer may not be redeemed for cash and may not be combined with certain other consumer incentives. 
Conditions and limitations apply. GM Canada reserves the right to amend or terminate offers for any reason in whole
 or in part at any time without prior notice. Void where prohibited. See dealer for details.
-NOTE:  Earnings from this card CANNOT be used with GM Canada Employee Vehicle Purchase Program - Company Owned PEP
330.title: The Scotiabank GM Visa Card Program

2020. Cruze returning customers are eligible to receive up to a $1,000 manufacturer to consumer incentive towards the purchase, lease or finance of an eligible
new 2019 MY GM vehicle that is delivered and reported sold between April 2, 2019 and July 2, 2019.

This incentive is intended to help close the payment gap from previous-generation to current-generation
product for a select group of customers, and to help encourage sales retention within the GM family.

Eligible GMF Cruze lessees will be identified in Dealer Direct via a Leads List. This Home Office Letter
will be updated when the Leads List is available. NOTE: The GMF Cruze returning customer does NOT need to be
on the Dealer Direct list to qualify

ELIGIBLE INDIVIDUALS:
- The individual does not need to trade-in their vehicle or terminate their lease to receive the Cruze Lease
Loyalty Offer.
- The individual does not have to be the original owner or original lessee to qualify.
- The vehicle must have been registered and insured (in Canada) in the customerx2019s name for the previous
consecutive six (6) months.
- Dealers must keep a copy of the Cruze vehicle Registration (plated portion for Lessee) on file in the Deal
Jacket for verification purposes (of the current leased GM vehicle AND of the NEW vehicle).
This offer may not be redeemed for cash and may not be combined with certain other consumer incentives.

488.consumer: First Time Buyer Program (#32100).  Standard Rules of Eligibility Apply.  First Time Buyer applicants are evaluated based on their individual creditworthiness, and must not have prior automotive finance history on credit bureau or derogatory credit, and must have verifiable monthly income sufficient to cover vehicle payment, ordinary living expenses and all outstanding debt.  Canadian Residents Only.  Limit one per household.  Contact your local dealer for full program details.  Some restrictions/conditions may apply.
488.dealer:
First Time Buyer Program

Ford of Canada will match the eligible customer's vehicle down payment (up to a maximum of $500) when they purchase, lease or factory-order an eligible new vehicle during the program period. 

 - Ford of Canada will provide a cash incentive equaling the eligible customer's vehicle down payment (up to a maximum of $500).

 - The customer may use the offer as a downpayment or choose to receive a rebate cheque from Ford of Canada.

 - Eligible customers may only redeem this offer once, on a maximum of one vehicle purchase.

 - Taxes payable before savings deducted. 

Eligible Delivery Types: 0, X, J, 1, 8, K, O, P, R, A 


ELIGIBLE CUSTOMERS - 

Canadian residents that are purchasing a vehicle for the first time will be eligible, providing all of the following stipulations are met:

 - The customer has a Ford Credit Tier 0, Tier 1, Tier 2 or Tier 3 Credit Score

 - The customer has confirmed they have no previous automotive financing history

 - The customer has confirmed they have no derogatory credit

 - The customer has verified full-time employment (minimum of 6 months)

 - The customer has verified income sufficient to meet ordinary living expenses

 - The customer has verified maximum vehicle payment-to-income (including add-ons) of 15%

 - The customer has verified maximum total debt-to-income of 50% (debt calculation including rent)

 - The customer has a verified driver's license

 - The customer has purchased all required insurance to operate the vehicle prior to delivery

 - The vehicle must be purchased or leased and registered in the name of the First Time Buyer (non transferable).
488.title: First Time Buyer Program

489.consumer: Ford Graduate Rebate Program (32101).  Canadian residents are eligible to take advantage of this offer if, within 24 months directly preceding the sale date, they have graduated, or will graduate (within the next four months) from an accredited university undergraduate degree program, or from a two-year (48 week minimum) college program, or from a three-year CEGEP D.E.C. program in Quebec; have graduated, or will graduate (within the next four months) from a recognized military or police academy; or are a full-time post-graduate student (Masters, Doctorate/PhD).  Limit one per household.  Contact your local dealer for full program details.  Some restrictions/conditions may apply.
489.dealer:
Ford Graduate Rebate Program

Ford of Canada will be extending a $500 Graduate Rebate to eligible graduates (see Eligible Customers below) who purchase, lease or factory-order an eligible new vehicle during the program period. 

 - The customer may use the offer as a downpayment or choose to receive a rebate cheque from Ford of Canada.

 - Only one Graduate Rebate may be applied toward the purchase or lease of an eligible vehicle.

 - The Graduate Rebate may only be redeemed once.

 - Taxes payable before savings deducted. 

Eligible Delivery Types: 9, 0, R, 6 


ELIGIBLE CUSTOMERS - 

Canadian residents are eligible to take advantage of this offer if, within 24 months directly preceding the sale date and within the program period, they:

 - Have graduated, or will graduate (within the next 4 months) from an accredited university undergraduate degree program, or from a two-year (48 weeks minimum) college program, or from a three-year CEGEP D.E.C. program in Quebec;

 - Have graduated, or will graduate (within the next 4 months) from a recognized military or police academy;

 - Are a full-time post-graduate student (Masters, Doctorate/PhD)

The vehicle must be purchased or leased and registered in the name of the graduating student.  


CUSTOMER ELIGIBILITY GUIDELINES x2013 Graduate Redemption Period

Canadian residents will be eligible for the Ford Graduate rebate offer provided they purchase, lease or factory order an eligible Ford vehicle within the program period and have graduated within 24-months directly preceding the vehicle sale date.

The maximum permissible time for offer redemption is 24 months from the date of graduation.

Customers with a graduation date that is more than 24 months from the time of vehicle purchase will NOT be eligible for the offer. 


REQUIRED SUPPORTING DOCUMENTATION - 

Dealers must obtain a copy of one of the following documents which must be kept in the customer deal jacket for audit purposes:

 - Copy of the customer's degree/diploma dated within 24 months prior to the vehicle sale date (within the program period).

 - Official letter from the Registrar's office confirming graduation within 4 months following the vehicle sale date.  The letter MUST state the customer's name and the length of the program the student is graduating from.

 - A copy of the customer cash claim form, signed by the customer, must also be maintained in the customer deal jacket for audit purposes.  


INCENTIVE CLAIMING INSTRUCTIONS

Dealer may submit claims after deal is locked and reported sold in Smart Vincent.

On claim entry please enter the following numeric values in the degree/diploma field:

 - Masters/PHD/Doctor - Enter 1

 - Undergrad - Enter 2

 - College - Enter 3

 - Police/Military - Enter 4
489.title: Ford Graduate Rebate Program

15318.consumer: 2019 Mobility Plus (#32238).  Standard Rules of Eligibility Apply.  Any Canadian resident who is physically challenged and requires the installation of adaptive driving aids or mobility assistance equipment are eligible.  Eligible customers must present a record of their physically challenged condition in the form of a doctor's note or government certificate.  Contact your local dealer for full program details.  Some restrictions/conditions may apply.
15318.dealer:
2019 Mobility Plus

The Mobility Program is designed to financially assist physically challenged individuals with a rebate of up to $1,000 toward the installation of adaptive driving aids or mobility assistance equipment in their new Ford of Canada vehicles.

The modifications on vehicles for this industry, whether they are the installation of adaptive devices and driving aids or structural modifications, must be carried out in such a manner that maintains the integrity and safety that was originally designed into each Ford vehicle.

It will be through adherence to these modification guidelines that we will be able to gain assurances from the various modifiers that the completed vehicles remain compliant with all Canadian Motor Vehicle Safety Standards. This will ensure that the mobility client receives a quality vehicle which has been modified by a company with the necessary compliance requirements.

Important Reminder: Mobility claims will be paid to an individual customer only. Claims made under Company names will be rejected and payment will not be issued. 

Reimbursement of up to $1,000 for costs incurred for adaptive driving aids or mobility assistance equipment.

Vehicle modification must be completed within six months of vehicle delivery.

Only modifications made by an approved conversion company will be eligible for the Ford Mobility Program. A Safety Compliance Certification Form, that must be completed, can be found on the Forms tab on DRIVE.


ELIGIBLE MODIFICATIONS & EQUIPMENT

Adaptive driving aids or mobility assistance equipment: 

-  Wheelchair lifts or other lift equipment

-  Hand or other driving controls

-  Door Openers

-  Lifts

-  Parking Brakes

-  Power Assisted Seats

-  Steering Devices

-  Wheelchair Restraints

Any other claims are subject to the prior approval of Ford of Canada. 


INELIGIBLE MODIFICATIONS & EQUIPMENT

The purpose of the Mobility Program is to provide support for physically challenged customers who require the installation of special adaptive driving aids or mobility assistance equipment to be able to drive or travel as a passenger in their vehicle. The program is not intended to provide financial assistance for the purpose of additional comfort or convenience.

The following modifications/equipment are not eligible for reimbursement: 

-  Factory Installed Options/Accessories

-  BackCycler Lumbar Products or similar back supports, rests, or massage units

-  Ford Dealership Installed Accessories or Equipment

Contact Dealer Claims Payment (1-800-387-7944) for eligibility concerns. 


APPROVED CONVERSION COMPANIES

IMPORTANT! Only modifications made by an approved conversion company will be eligible for the Mobility Program.

To be eligible for reimbursement, eligible equipment must be installed by either:

-  Ford Quality Vehicle Modifier (QVM) participant (required for structural vehicle modifications)

-  National Mobility Equipment Dealer Association (NMEDA) member

-  Modifier holding current National Safety Mark (NSM) with Transport Canada

As part of the claiming process, a Compliance Claim form must accompany each Ford Mobility claim submission. Refer to Forms Tab

So what are the requirements?

We require that the installation of the Vehicle Accessibility equipment or Driving Aids must be performed by a company that is either: 

-  A participant in the Ford Mobility Quality Vehicle Modifier Program (QVM)

-  Or a National Mobility Equipment Dealer Association (NMEDA) member

-  Or said company must be able to provide their National Safety Mark and provide a statement from an officer of the company as evidence of training in the installation of the applicable accessibility equipment and/or driving aids.

-  If the modification Company has sub-contracted these services from a third party, they must identify the QVM status of the company or provide the National Safety Mark and a statement related to the evidence of training in the installation of the applicable mobility equipment.

-  If the subcontracted vehicle conversion services are provided by a company from outside Canada, the claimant must provide evidence that the conversion is eligible for importation by identifying that the manufacturer is listed on Transport Canada's Pre-Clearance list for the specific adaptive conversion that was undertaken.


INCENTIVE CLAIMING / ADMINISTRATION

Dealers may manually claim Mobility program benefits under Program #32238 by returning a completed copy of the Mobility program claim form along with supporting documents (see below) to Dealer Claims Payment.

Supporting Documents:

-  A completed copy of the claim form signed by the customer. Refer to Forms Tab

-  A record of the equipment installation invoice with work order

-  A copy of a doctor's note or government certificate describing the customers physically challenged condition

-  A completed copy of the Ford Mobility Motoring Compliance Claim Form. Refer to Forms Tab

15536.consumer:
GM Canada is pleased to announce the renewal of the GM Mobility Program. GM Canada will continue to
reimburse Dealers up to a maximum of $1,000 (tax exclusive) through the GM Mobility Program toward the cost
of adapting an eligible Chevrolet, Buick, GMC or Cadillac to accommodate the accessibility and driving needs
of this market. This program is intended to allow Dealers to meet the transportation needs of individuals
with disabilities or to assist an eligible customer in converting a vehicle for convenient access in
transporting a person with a disability.
This offer may not be redeemed for cash and may not be combined with certain other consumer incentives.
 Conditions and limitations apply. GM Canada reserves the right to amend or terminate offers for any reason in whole or in part at any time
 without prior notice. Void where prohibited. See dealer for details.
15536.dealer:
GM Canada is pleased to announce the renewal of the GM Mobility Program. GM Canada will continue to
reimburse Dealers up to a maximum of $1,000 (tax exclusive) through the GM Mobility Program toward the cost
of adapting an eligible Chevrolet, Buick, GMC or Cadillac to accommodate the accessibility and driving needs
of this market. This program is intended to allow Dealers to meet the transportation needs of individuals
with disabilities or to assist an eligible customer in converting a vehicle for convenient access in
transporting a person with a disability.

ELIGIBLE ADAPTIVE EQUIPMENT:
- Must be permanently installed in an eligible vehicle.
- Must be installed for a driver or passenger with a permanent disability.
- Vehicle conversion must be completed for eligible participants within 12 months of the new
vehicle purchase/lease date.
- Regular production options and GM accessories are not eligible for reimbursement. (excl. Assist Steps)

ELIGIBLE ADAPTIVE EQUIPMENT & MODIFICATIONS INCLUDE:
- Vehicle Entry
- Brake/Accelerator Systems
- Driver Position
- Steering System
- Seats
- Other Vehicle Modifications

VEHICLE ENTRY:
- Automatic Door Opener (when used with lift)
- Assist Handles
- Ramp
- Transfer Platform
- Wheelchair and/or Scooter Lift
- Assist Step

BRAKE/ACCELERATOR SYSTEMS:
- Brakes  Reduced Effort
- Brake System (Emergency Back-up)
- Parking Brake  Push/Pull Control
- Parking Brake  Electric
- Parking Brake  Extension Lever
- Hand Controls
- Servo Assisted Hand Controls
- Left Foot Accelerator
DRIVER POSITION:
- Driving Consoles  Relocation of Secondary Controls
- Elbow Switches
- Gear Selector Lever For Left Hand
- Power Channels/Power Pan
- Turn Signal Lever for Right Hand
- Wheelchair Tie-down and/or Lockdown System

STEERING SYSTEM:
- Adaptive Steering Devices
- Steering Controls
- Foot Control Steering
- Horizontal Steering
- Steering Column Extension
- Steering System  Emergency Back-up
- Steering System  Reduced/Zero Effort
SEATS:
- Vinyl Seat Cover  (Front seat area only)
- Swivel Seat (non-OEM product only)
- Extended Travel Transfer Seat (non-OEM Only)
- Only if vehicle is not available with vinyl/leather.
-GM Mobility will not reimburse for relocation of, or modification to, original equipment seats or seat tracks.

OTHER VEHICLE MODIFICATIONS:
- Joystick Driving Systems
- Inverter Installation
- Lowered Floor
- Roof Mounted Wheelchair Carrier
- Quad Key Holder/Turner
- Raised Roof/Door (when used with lift)
- Alert Systems

PLEASE NOTE:
- The GM Mobility Program was established to assist drivers with disabilities in the purchase or lease of a new GM vehicle.
- It is contrary to the spirit and intent of this program for a Dealer or aftermarket supplier to specifically merchandise product
  that may be eligible for reimbursement under the GM Mobility Program. This includes the solicitation of customers who may
  qualify under the program.

ELIGIBLE INDIVIDUALS:
- Purchasers or Lessees of eligible vehicles who require modification of their vehicle to enable them to drive, or allow convenient
  access to enable them to transport a person with a disability.
- Only drivers who are deaf or hard of hearing (loss of 30 decibels of hearing in any frequency range) are eligible for reimbursement
  for the cost of alerting device equipment.
- A Physicians Authorization Form (Attachment B) is required for all claims involving alerting devices (Refer to Program Guideline
  5 for details of when a physicians authorization is required).
- GM Canada will pay for the Mobility Program allowance on a company vehicle (including customers receiving competitive assistance)
  if the vehicle operator requires adaptive equipment. Dealers must attach the Physicians Authorization Form to the claim verifying the
  equipment is required for health reasons. The Mobility Program allowance is not meant as a supplement for vehicles that are
  converted to use for hire (e.g. Taxis, Limo Service, and Transit Buses).
ALLOWANCES:
- GM Canada will reimburse Dealers up to $1,000 (tax exclusive) for claims matching the cost of the adaptive equipment, including
  installation, or the cost of transferring existing equipment to an eligible GM vehicle.
- This is a manufacturer-to-dealer credit.
INELIGIBLE AMOUNTS:
- Courtesy Transportation charges and charges for transportation of parts relative to the modification are not eligible for reimbursement.
This offer may not be redeemed for cash and may not be combined with certain other consumer incentives.
 Conditions and limitations apply. GM Canada reserves the right to amend or terminate offers for any reason in whole or in part at any time
 without prior notice. Void where prohibited. See dealer for details.
15536.title: GM Mobility Program

22159.consumer: Ford Ottawa Auto Show Bonus (#32223).  Standard Rules of Eligibility Apply.  Selected Canadian residents who attend one of the 2019 Canadian Auto Shows will receive a $750 Auto Show Bonus, provided they visit the Ford display and provide their contact information.  Individuals must opt-in to receive marketing communications for Ford and provide their full mailing and e-mail address to receive the offer.  Customers who do not submit their information via the on-site registration process, do not opt-in to receive marketing communications, do not provide their complete contact information, or are not randomly selected to receive a Canadian Auto Show Bonus Offer will not receive the offer and will not be eligible for the Auto Show Bonus.  Only customers that receive the Auto Show Bonus, via email, will be eligible for the offer.  Limit one per household.  Must redeem using original offer; no mechanically or otherwise reproduced certificates will be accepted.  Prior purchases not eligible.  Contact your local dealer for full program details.  Some restrictions/conditions may apply.
22159.dealer:
Ford Ottawa Auto Show Bonus

The Ford Auto Show Bonus will be available to selected customers that opt-in to receive marketing communications from Ford (via Customer Service Representative Registration), receive the offer via e-mail, and who purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle during the applicable Auto Show program period.

Customer Service Representatives (CSRs) will be on-site to assist customers with questions and provide information. Selected customers who are interested in purchasing a Ford vehicle (deemed to be in-market), will be encouraged to submit their contact information and opt-in to receive communications from Ford of Canada. By doing so, these customers may be eligible to receive the Auto Show Bonus.

IMPORTANT: Not every customer that opts-in to receive marketing communications from Ford of Canada will receive an Auto Show Bonus or be eligible to receive an Auto Show Bonus. A selection of customers that opt-in will not receive (or be eligible for) the offer. Only customers that receive the Auto Show Bonus will be eligible.

IMPORTANT: The $750 incentive will be jointly funded by Ford of Canada and Ford of Canada Dealerships. Ford of Canada will contribute $500 of the customer incentive amount. The Dealer contribution will be $250 for each incentive claim.

The customer may use the offer as a down payment or choose to receive a rebate cheque from Ford of Canada.

Only one Auto Show Bonus may be applied toward the purchase or lease of an eligible vehicle.

The offer may only be redeemed once.

No mechanically or otherwise reproduced certificates will be accepted.

Taxes payable before savings deducted. 


ELIGIBLE CUSTOMERS

Selected Canadian residents who attend one of the 2019 Canadian Auto Shows will receive a $750 Auto Show Bonus, provided they:

- Visit the Ford display and provide their contact information (information collected via an iPad provided by on-site CSRs). Individuals must opt-in to receive marketing communications from Ford and provide their full mailing and e-mail address to receive the offer.

- Purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle during the program period.

Customers that do not submit their information via the on-site registration process, do not opt-in to receive marketing communications, do not provide their complete contact information, or are not randomly selected to receive a Canadian Auto Show Bonus Offer will not receive the offer and will not be eligible for the Auto Show Bonus. No exceptions or add-ons will be permitted.

Not every individual that opts-in to receive marketing communications from Ford of Canada will receive an Auto Show Bonus, nor will they be eligible to receive an Auto Show Bonus. Only selected customers that opt-in will receive the Auto Show Bonus. Only customers that receive the Auto Show Bonus, via email, will be eligible for the offer.

Eligibility can be checked in Smart VINCENT and ConsumerLINK.

Due to privacy concerns, only customers can submit their information via the registration process (iPad form completion). Dealership personnel are not to enter customer information on behalf of the customer. 


AUTO SHOW BONUS DISTRIBUTION

An email that communicates the Auto Show Bonus Offer will be sent to selected customers within 24 hours from the time they submit their information via the registration process. Only selected customers that opt-in to receive communications may receive the Auto Show Bonus certificate. (Note: Not all customers that opt-in to receive offers from Ford of Canada will receive the Auto Show Bonus). 


DEALER PARTICIPATION / CONTRIBUTION

Ford of Canada Dealers will be responsible for covering $250 of the total Auto Show Bonus amount by claiming dealer charge program 99103 first in Smart Vincent.

Participation in the Auto Show Bonus program is completely voluntary.

Dealers choosing to participate in the program agree to offer all eligible customers (that purchase an eligible vehicle during the program period) a $750 Auto Show Bonus incentive by claiming the correct Auto Show program (noted in Vincent program # section.). Dealer to include the customer's Certificate Number.

Dealer will be responsible for contributing $250 toward the customer incentive amount (via claiming program 99103 $250 charge as a pre-requisite to claiming the applicable Auto Show program).

Claiming the Ford of Canada contribution on any one vehicle constitutes a Dealer's agreement to participate in the program for all eligible deliveries for the duration of the program. 

Eligible Delivery Types:  6, 7, A, E, 9, 0, X, J, 1, 8, L, K, O, R, P
22159.title: Ford Ottawa Auto Show Bonus

22390.consumer: Technology Bonus (#71214).  Standard Rules of Eligibility Apply.  Not all buyers will qualify.  Canadian Residents Only.  Contact your local dealer for full program details.  Some restrictions/conditions may apply.
22390.dealer:
Technology Bonus

Beginning April 2nd, Ford of Canada will be advertising and offering a new $750 Technology Bonus available on almost every new Ford vehicle during the April/May program period.

The intention of the Technology Bonus is to:

-  Draw attention to the cutting-edge technology features available on our full line-up of Ford vehicles,

-  Showcase available technology features in our advertising, and

-  Further encourage customers to visit dealerships to learn more about Ford technology options and the $750 Technology Bonus.

The Technology Bonus is NOT tied to any specific technology feature or option, and it does NOT require the purchase of any Ford technology feature or option package to qualify for incentive eligibility. 

It will be available to every customer that purchases, leases or factory orders an eligible Ford vehicle (see eligibility below) during the program period.

The Technology Bonus will be treated as supplemental Delivery Allowance support (not a customer cash rebate). The selling price on the End User's buyer's agreement should be shown as the amount net of any offered Delivery Allowance PLUS the $750 Technology Bonus. The intent is to reduce the vehicle-selling price to the End User by the total amount of both the Delivery Allowance and $750 Technology Bonus.

In all cases, 100% of the $750 Technology Bonus must be passed onto the customer.

Eligible Delivery Types:  6, 7, A, 9, E, 0, X, J, 1, L, 8, K, O, R, P
22390.title: Technology Bonus

20096.dealer:
PROGRAM DESCRIPTION:
- From February 1, 2019 to April 30, 2019, GM Canada is providing certain individuals who were World Junior Ice Hockey Championship volunteers with a $1,000 (tax inclusive) incentive towards the purchase, lease or finance of an eligible new and unused 2019MY Chevrolet, Buick or GMC vehicle.
- Eligible individuals who receive an email from Hockey Canada (and only those who receive such a communication), may visit their local GM Canada Dealership to redeem their $1,000 (tax inclusive) incentive towards the purchase, lease or finance of an eligible new and unused 2019MY Chevrolet, Buick or GMC vehicle.
- Eligible individuals can redeem ONLY one (1) $1,000 World Juniorx2019s Volunteer Bonus offer per person per vehicle purchase, and must redeem their offer and take delivery prior to April 30, 2019.
- Eligible individuals will be asked to provide their World Juniorx2019s Volunteer Bonus email to the Dealer/Retailer to retain in the deal jacket. Photocopies are not acceptable.
- IN-SERVICE RETENTION PERIOD:
* Possession of the vehicle and registration title must remain in the name of the eligible

12111.consumer: Buyers may be eligible for cash incentive on purchase of select vehicles. This is a Manufacturer-to-Dealer discount; must be applied as a reduction to the actual selling price before taxes. See your local Nissan dealer for complete details.
12111.dealer:
Buyers may be eligible for cash incentive on purchase of select vehicles. Please refer to the program rule for full details on the non-stackable cash and how it can be combined with other programs. This is a Manufacturer-to-Dealer discount; must be applied as a reduction to the actual selling price before taxes.

Sale type 3, (A, Q, J, W, Z)

Stackable Dollar cash incentive cannot be used in conjunction with the NCF Special Rate Lease or Finance programs. The Non-Stackable Dollar and NCF Standard Rate Lease or Finance Cash must be applied as a reduction to the actual selling price before taxes. Dealers must enter the correct Sale Type and Subclass (see table below) when retailing the unit in the system in order to be accurately reimbursed by Nissan Canada or to prevent any chargebacks should records be audited in the future. Please note Nissan Canada will reimburse the Dealer the applicable cash incentive amount plus taxes (i.e. GST/HST, QST), or process a chargeback if required, through VIMS. The GST/HST, QST must then be remitted to the respective taxing authorities. Dealerships must ensure that the proper subclass is applied to the vehicle.

The monthly program grids clearly outline which vehicles are eligible for the Non-Stackable Dollar and NCF Standard Rate Cash incentives. If the grid does not reflect any Non-Stackable Dollar or NCF Standard Rate Cash on a specific model or trim, it means the Non-Stackable Dollar or NCF Standard Rate Cash incentive is not available on that specific model or trim and should be communicated as such to the customer. For clarity, where a model is identified as having no Non-Stackable Dollar or NCF Standard Rate Cash incentives, it is not eligible for any Non-Stackable Dollar or NCF Standard Rate Cash under any circumstances.
